titles: A proclamation, appointing the magistrates of burghs of regality and barrony, and their clerks, to take the oath of alleadgeance, and signe the declaration. Edinbvrgh, the first day of August, 1678.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693.
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed: Al. Gibsone, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Loyalty oaths --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
